title: OhO en tOzhargaL
sahitya:
OhO en tOzhargaL en Aruyir sahOdarargAL
 uttamap-pirappaDaindOm haran hari guNam pADuvOmE


anupallavi

  lOka vAzhvu minnal pOnradanrO uLLa pOdE inbattait-tEDuvOmE
 Odi Adum pambaram pOla Oyndu ulagilirundu maraiyum nAL enrO


caraNam    yArE tuNai iraivan anri yamanait-taDai sheyyum marunduNDO
 iDai vazhi vanda makkaL manai sondam illaiyE manam varunda sheyyum bandham
 enrum ungaL rAmadAsan ini adum eLiyadum ippADal
 iravum paghalum ninaindu pADi irm bhavak-kaDal tANDa vArIr
